Fridder:

Just pay the 200k or whatever it is. That’s what I did. It’s only $0.55 per million if you want to just buy an extra million for it.

item.title: Runescape monkey madness puzzle [help]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

3 steps.
Youtube a guide.
Do the guide
Profit.
Do not see how that’s hard if your not fussed about how much u make ph (if that’s what your bank was then youtube guides are bank loots for you).
But hunting graahks are like 400k-800k ph depending on your hunter lvl.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape monkey madness puzzle [help]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:12, topic:457853”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=560778.msg4093581#msg4093581 date=1346628587]

[quote author=Fridder link=topic=560778.msg4093573#msg4093573 date=1346628124]

[quote author=Mitko link=topic=560778.msg4093087#msg4093087 date=1346587152]

Just pay the 200k or whatever it is. That’s what I did. It’s only $0.55 per million if you want to just buy an extra million for it.
[/quote]You can pay to get puzzles done? Is that by players or npcs?

NPCs. You’re permitted to either solve the puzzle or pay 200k to the guard or whatever.
[/quote]Never knew this before. You’re a life saver. I was almost going to drop my elite clue scroll puzzle, I hope it can be solved by that npc aswell.
[/quote]You misunderstood, it’s only for Monkey Madness (puzzle specific). I’m sure you could find someone to do your elite scroll puzzle.[/quote]I’d gladly do it, but I feel like I’d be untrusted, etc

I do these for fun all the time. I’m obsessed with them:

Read full topic

Just pay the 200k or whatever it is. That’s what I did. It’s only $0.55 per million if you want to just buy an extra million for it.
[/quote]You can pay to get puzzles done? Is that by players or npcs?

NPCs. You’re permitted to either solve the puzzle or pay 200k to the guard or whatever.
[/quote]Never knew this before. You’re a life saver. I was almost going to drop my elite clue scroll puzzle, I hope it can be solved by that npc aswell.[/quote]
Its only for the quest the clue scrolls ones you do by yourself. But tbh I don’t understand how people have such a hard time on puzzle boxes or knots.

item.title: Runescape monkey madness puzzle [help]
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Try to find an image of it, and go from top to bottom. When you get to the last four rows try to organize first

There’s a button in game to view the completed image.

item.title: Runescape monkey madness puzzle [help]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Just keep flipping them around. I’m trying to give you exact directions how, but it takes too long and is very confusing to record, especially with the speed I complete these puzzles at. If I could, I’d do it for you, but I can’t. I’ve also been trying to replicate this configuration on a 5-puzzle app on my iPod. Seriously, its been 15 minutes and I can’t even get that exact configuration without accidentally solving it. Believe me, paying the 200k will make this is a lot easier on you, because you won’t be able to solve this without messing up a sizable portion of the rest of the puzzle.

Read full topic
